com.SIMRacingApps.servlets

Class DataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SIMRacingApps.servlets.DataService

  • public class DataService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Data Caching Service for the servlets. It starts up a background thread that waits for events from the SIM, where it updates the cache with any new values.

    It is implemented as a singleton, where the all you have to do is call the static method getJSON(String) with the sessionid. This method returns a JSON formatted string with all the data that has changed since the last call.

    Other configuration options are available and must be called before your first call to getJSON().

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeffrey Gilliam
    Copyright:
    Copyright (C) 2015 - 2016 Jeffrey Gilliam
    License:
    Apache License 2.0

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public static void stop()

      • setSIMname

        public static void setSIMname(java.lang.String SIMName)
        Sets the name of the SIM to connect to. By default, it is set to iRacing. If a different SIM is running, it will stop it.
        Parameters:
        SIMName - The name of the SIM. Defaults to iRacing.

      • setStartingVersion

        public static void setStartingVersion(java.lang.String startingVersion)
        If playing back a recorded file, this sets the position to start playing it at.
        Parameters:
        startingVersion - The SIM specific version to start at.

      • setEndingVersion

        public static void setEndingVersion(java.lang.String endingVersion)
        If playing back a recorded file, this sets the position to stop playing it at.
        Parameters:
        endingVersion - The SIM specific version to end at.

      • setPlay

        public static void setPlay(java.lang.String playfile)
        Sets the file to use to play back a recorded session.
        Parameters:
        playfile - The filename to use.

      • getRecord

        public static Data getRecord()

      • setRecord

        public static void setRecord(java.lang.String recordfile)
        Sets the file to record the session to.
        Parameters:
        recordfile - The file to record to. Can be null or blank to stop recording.

      • deleteSession

        public static void deleteSession(java.lang.String sessionid)
        Used by the servlets to delete a session from the cache.
        Parameters:
        sessionid - The session to delete.

      • getData

        public static Data getData(java.lang.String datapath)
                    throws SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException
        Used by the servlets to return a data from the SIM directly, bypassing the cache.
        Parameters:
        datapath - The path to the data.
        Returns:
        The result as a Data object.
        Throws:
        SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException - If there's an error during the call.

      • getJSON

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getJSON(java.lang.String sessionid,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>> data)
        This method is called to subscribe to the data and return the results as a JSON string. If data is null, then only the results are returned.
        Parameters:
        sessionid - The session identifier.
        data - The data to subscribe to.
        Returns:
        A JSON String with the results.

      • getJSON

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getJSON(java.lang.String sessionid)
        Returns the results as a JSON String.
        Parameters:
        sessionid - The session identifier
        Returns:
        The results.
